title: Day 43: The Ark of the Covenant (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike provides us with a mental picture of the ark of the covenant and reminds that the small details of worship matter as we read Exodus 25-26, Leviticus 19, and Psalm 119:1-56
